attributes.action: Want Minsters Expenses And Second Homes Allowences To Be Stopped!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a child parrents always says stop misbehaving or I'll take it away,which is an empty threat generally.We should not except the fact OUR money is being handed out to people to buy homes or shop in john Lewis.Would you be happy if all the people on JSA got there Crisis loans based on the prices expensive stores? well i doubt you would! I feel any misuse should lead to assets gain while working for goverment under expenses such as houses and furniture should be taken away once they leave power or misuse the benifits after all most of them have lots retreats.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
